column3: â€œthis beautiful beast lures you in with a dark cherry tartness and sweat-tea notes, and then proceeds to immediately melt your face. this is a full on giggly weird high. you'll notice a little slowness and you might feel cross-eyed but no couch lock. Not the most beautiful to look at but the effects, aroma and taste make up for it.  I love it and it is becoming a favorite.â€

â€œPIE FACE (HYBRID) 
ïƒ˜	
Pine aroma with a slight cherry scent, guessing high Humulene/A-Pinene terpening profile.
ïƒ˜	
Diesel skunk aroma on bud breakup.
ïƒ˜	
Sugar taste on the tongue after exhale, may be the cherry.
ïƒ˜	
Light smooth pine flavor inhaling, non-harsh smoke. 
ïƒ˜	
Instantly felt more focused after one toke (30 seconds)
ïƒ˜	
Energetic but not edgy/fidgety feeling.
A great strain for more focused energetic feeling....â€

â€œThis is one of the best strains that I have ran into in awhile. A combo of cherry pie and faceoff o.g. This powerful hybrid has notes of peanut, strawberry, cherry, and a slight kush taste. The buds are so beautiful and the smell alone will make you love this strain. Prefect for day or night, so all around great strain that makes you very social while also giving you a great relaxing body buzz. Highly highly recommen...â€
â€œFifty year old weed virgin again. As an addendum to my prior review, I tried this strain again and this time ended up eating the planet. Some blogs are saying this is a skinny weed". Well
column5: not so much. I think it was worth at least an extra 1000 calories intake. If that matters to you
column6: this strain is a hit/miss. You might try Double Dream
column7: I just had that this morning before my bedtime (daysleeper)...â€"

column3: â€œThis strain is in my top 5- the cherry pez-like aroma and flavor are misleading as the effects can be overwhelming if caution is not shown. The first draws and exhale are filled with tart, sweet cherries and grapefruit citrus, and you can't help but take one more just for the taste- but if over indulged, a nap is in your immediate future. Titration is key, and going slow will make all the difference between functioni...â€
â€œAfter a long day of working it's a great way to unwind. The high starts off very chill and then bam! it's like getting hit in the face with a pie! VERY potent, not for novice users.â€
â€œThis beauty is a very nice afternoon high, keeps you with clear head. but relaxed body. Makes me hungry. And as always it's great for pain relief.â€

â€œThe buds I got were not listed as OG, so I don't know how much of a difference that makes. 

This strain is fine. It has a lovely, herbal flavour to it. In small doses, it's a fun and euphoric high. It increases my interest in being social, as well. Larger doses knock me right out. It's middle-of-the-road, for me; nothing exceptional.

It should be noted that I probably have a lower than average tolerance.â€
â€œPotent, smells yummy and a high yield, Pie Face OG is a damn legit strain.â€

â€œIt'll get you high, but like the description said it'll leave you so wiggle room. Very good social strain good for big parties. Nice body note with this  strain it's a well rounded high. Totally worth getting a couple grams.â€

â€œDelicious and potent indica dominant strain! I love this strain having recently discovered it. It mostly has the sweet floral flavor of grand daddy purps crossed with a hint of piney kush taste. A strong body high is accompanied by a mild yet uplifting head buzz. Highly recommended!â€
